subject: Horse Racing
Spelling
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
Belmont Stakes
American Pharoah (Race Horse)
lead_paragraph: The owners of the Triple Crown hopeful, whose name was registered with the Jockey Club, suggested two possible reasons the thoroughbred’s name is spelled the way it is.
snippet: The owners of the Triple Crown hopeful, whose name was registered with the Jockey Club, suggested two possible reasons the thoroughbred’s name is spelled the way it is.
